mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO TB_RESERVATION VALUES ( SEQ_RESVNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{siteNo}, #{checkInDate}, #{checkOutDate}, SYSDATE, #{people}, #{reserName}, #{reserPhone}, #{price}, 'Y' ) INTO TB_PAYMENTLIST VALUES ( #{priceNo}, SEQ_RESVNO.CURRVAL ) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(RESERVATION_NO) FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND RESER_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, SITE_NO, PEOPLE, PEOPLE * (CHECKOUT_DATE - CHECKIN_DATE) * SITE_PRICE AS PRICE, TO_CHAR(CHECKIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || '~' || TO_CHAR(CHECKOUT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PERIOD, RESER_STATUS FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_SITE USING(SITE_NO) JOIN TB_PRICE USING(TYPE_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{ memberId } ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC
